metadata.description: The Microsoft Sentinel workspace into which the function will be deployed. Has to be in the selected Resource Group.
The region of the selected workspace. The default value will use the Region selection above.

properties.query:
WinSmtp_CL
| extend RawDataElements = split(RawData, ",")
| extend Timestamp = RawDataElements[0], ConnectorID = RawDataElements[1], SessionID = RawDataElements[2], Sequence = RawDataElements[3], LocalEndpoint = RawDataElements[4], RemoteEndpoint = RawDataElements[5], FlowIndicator = RawDataElements[6], StatusMessage = RawDataElements[7]
| extend EventType = case(ConnectorID has_any("Send Connector"), "Send", "Receive")
| extend LocalIP = tostring(split(LocalEndpoint, ":")[0]), LocalPort = tostring(split(LocalEndpoint, ":")[1]), RemoteIP = tostring(split(RemoteEndpoint, ":")[0]), RemotePort = tostring(split(RemoteEndpoint, ":")[1])
| extend HostName = extract(@"(\w+SMTPRELAY\d+)", 1, tostring(ConnectorID))
| project TimeGenerated, Timestamp, ConnectorID, HostName, EventType, SessionID, Sequence, LocalIP, LocalPort, RemoteIP, RemotePort, FlowIndicator, StatusMessage
